TopicTitle: Science transfer through antenna playing non stop (Heavily modded KSP)

Articles.Content:
Howdy, 

Quick question over here

I have a bunch of mods that change the gameplay considerably. One of them (I think Kerbalism) probably did something about the science being transfered through antenas. Now whenever I have a set of science instruments and an antenna, the sound of science being transfered via comm net plays non stop. Its really annoying, specially now that i'm seting up a space station.

I haven't got the patience to actually seek out the root cause of this. 
The simple solution would be to delete the file responsible for the sound altogether. 

Is it possible? Would it cause crashes or even krakens? Where the file is located and whats the name of it?

Thanks!

Edited August 2, 2019 by PayadorPerseguido

Hello @PayadorPerseguido.

I've moved your post to Add-on discussions.
I believe there is a setting to shut it off, also if you are playing with Chatterer, it also has a setting (iirc) to disable the science xfer soundfx.
